tasks.task: Laying Polly Pipe in a bean field
subtasks: Stretching to prepare for the task
Following a tractor to create a ditch
Placing dirt on the polypipe to prevent it from blowing off
Turning a lever to activate the popper (water supply)

tasks.task: Using a poker to create holes in the polypipe for water distribution
subtasks: Ensuring water pressure is maintained at the start of the field
Selecting the appropriate size of holes based on field length
Repurposing or disposing of the polypipe for future use

tasks.task: Operating Polly Pipe for field irrigation
subtasks: Laying the pipe behind the tractor
Placing dirt on the pipe to stabilize it
Turning the lever to activate the water flow
Using a poker to create distribution holes
Recycle the pipe after use

tasks.task: Laying Polly Pipe in a bean field
subtasks: Following the tractor to create a shallow trench
Placing the pipe in the trench
Covering the pipe with dirt to anchor it
Turning on the water supply (lever)
Creating holes in the pipe for water distribution
Reusing or disposing of the pipe once done

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Laying Polly Pipe in a bean field
subtasks: Following the tractor to create a trench
Placing the pipe in the trench
Covering the pipe with dirt
Activating the water supply (turning the lever)
Creating distribution holes in the pipe
Recycling the pipe after use

tasks.task: Laying Polly Pipe in a bean field
subtasks: Following the tractor to create a trench
Placing the pipe in the trench
Covering the pipe with dirt
Activating the water supply (turning the lever)
Creating distribution holes in the pipe
Recycling the pipe after use
